about_the_game:
"Changes" is what this DLC will bring. Constant changes. Unexpected changes. World-turning changes. Honecker, Ceausescu, Zhivkov, they all step off their line, as if the isekai travelers have entered their minds, and intend to change everything they touch!

- New historical paths for each country that not under the control of the player
- Ability to customize these paths or leave them to a will of chance
- About 40 new endings for countries that not controlled by the player
- About 60 new events for countries that not controlled by the player
- New achievements

Try to survive in a constantly changing world!
detailed_description:
"Changes" is what this DLC will bring. Constant changes. Unexpected changes. World-turning changes. Honecker, Ceausescu, Zhivkov, they all step off their line, as if the isekai travelers have entered their minds, and intend to change everything they touch!

- New historical paths for each country that not under the control of the player
- Ability to customize these paths or leave them to a will of chance
- About 40 new endings for countries that not controlled by the player
- About 60 new events for countries that not controlled by the player
- New achievements

Try to survive in a constantly changing world!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

name: Ostalgie: Paths of History

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (32-bit, 64-bit)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, Windows 8, 8.1, Windows 10, etc (32-bit, 64-bit)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
